name: Snow Castles: The Trials and Tribulations of Trying to Study while depressed
name_original: Snow Castles: The Trials and Tribulations of Trying to Study while depressed
description:
Snow Castles: The Trials and Tribulations of Trying to Study while depressed is a game developed by varluch. It was originally released in 2021.
Snow Castles: The Trials and Tribulations of Trying to Study while depressed is available on PC and macOS. The game is sold via itch.io.
